timeline.headline: Timeline of BVN
timeline.text: Events related to the Firm BVN

date.headline: Arthur Bligh establishes practice in Toowoomba
Arthur Bligh moves practice to Brisbane
C.W. Jessup joins practice as full partner
Athol Bretnall joins the practice as partner
H.J. Parkinson joins the practice as partner
Ronald Voller joins the practice
Practice takes the name Bligh, Jessup, Bretnall and Partners
Graham Bligh becomes partner
Bernard Ryan becomes partner
Ronald Voller becomes partner
Jon Voller joins the practice
Arthur Bligh retires
Ronald Voller retires
Construction completed: Watkins Place, Brisbane
date.text: Client: Watkins Property and Administration Pty Ltd

date.headline: Construction completed: Runaway Bay Shopping Centre, Gold Coast
Construction completed: Supreme Court Building, Brisbane
Construction completed: District Courts Building, Brisbane
Construction completed: Presbyterian Church of Australia, Brisbane
Construction completed: University of Queensland Sports Union Complex, Brisbane
date.text: Client: Sports Union of University of Queensland

date.headline: Construction completed: Capalba Tavern, Capalba
Construction completed: Sanitarium Factory, Brisbane
Construction completed: Edwards Dunlop Warehouses, Brisbane
Construction completed: Intensive Minimal Disease Piggery, Lawes
Construction completed: Poultry Technology and Research Unit, Lawes
Construction completed: Meat Abattoir, Lawes
Construction completed: Queensland Agricultural College, Lawes
date.text: Client: Department of the Co-ordinator General and the Queensland Agricultural College Council

date.headline: Construction completed: General Teaching Buildings Mount Gravatt Teachers' College, Brisbane
Construction completed: Library and Science Building, Brisbane
date.text: Client: Brisbane Boys College, Brisbane Boys College P & F Committee
